search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for OrbisX (orbisx.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for OrbisX is: [https://orbisx.com/pricing](https://orbisx.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
Pricing - OrbisX
===============

  

##### Core Features

The basics and everything you need to run a business of any size

##### Automation & AI

Followups, reminders, post-service notices, signatures, confirmations… you name it!

##### Marketing & Growth

AI-based followups and bookings, contests, bulk messaging and automation

##### Finances, Estimates & Gift Cards

Estimates, invoices, payments, deposits,  expenses and gift cards

##### Appointments

One-off or recurring events with everything about each job in one place

##### Communication

Text/Image messaging (SMS/MMS), voice calling, customer message history

##### Staff & Users

Time tracking, schedules, time-off, permission levels, payroll, tips, commissions

##### Online Booking Forms

Customizable booking form settings and options without overbooking your team

##### Reporting & Accounting

Insights and stats about your business including future projections on sales

##### Mobile Services

Fleet management, route trip planners, Street View, mileage tracking and more

##### Inventory

AI-based inventory tracking, low-notice warnings, POS system barcode scanning

##### Hardware & Technology

GPS tracking, payment terminals, VIN scanning, plate detection and more

×

Simple & Transparent Pricing

![Image 14](https://orbisx.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/orbisx-preview-laptop.jpg)

At OrbisX we believe in simplicity. When we started our auto shop we were forced to use multiple tools apps, tools and softwares that were overpriced and lacking necessary features for our industry. Each of these apps had their own fees and headaches while only getting the job half done. We built OrbisX to run our shop from one central app to remove the disconnects, reduce operating costs and add in the missing pieces to create the perfect software for automotive professionals. Once we decided to make it available to automotive pros around the globe we wanted to keep it simple for our members with one pricing plan that includes everything you need.

**OrbisX has all the bells and whistles that your company needs to truly succeed.** We have invested and continue to invest thousands of hours of development and artificial intelligence to help your business grow.

This is not just another glorified Excel sheet and customer management system. OrbisX is a business growth and customer experience system with all the tools you need like CARFAX, Reserve With Google, SiriusXM, QuickBooks, Stripe, Square, Clover, Dialpad, Twilio integrations (+ 5000 other apps) and everything from invoicing, payments, expenses, deposits, estimates, reports and financials to automation like our AI that books appointments for you!

![Image 15](https://orbisx.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/shutterstock_2479720287.jpg)

![Image 16](https://orbisx.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/phone2.png)

Streamline Everything for Your Business
---------------------------------------

OrbisX offers a comprehensive solution to manage, automate, and grow your business with marketing tools and artificial intelligence under the hood. Our platform enables you to schedule jobs more efficiently, send professional quotes and invoices, accept online payments, and generate detailed reports. With features like automated Google reviews and appointment reminders, inventory management, staff time tracking, and on-the-spot payments with hardware terminals, OrbisX streamlines your operations seamlessly. Plus, our intuitive mobile app, video training resources, and easy setup ensure that you’ll be running a more efficient business in no time. Join OrbisX today and experience unparalleled convenience and growth.

Simple Pricing. No contracts. Unlimited potential, automation and growth.

#### $100/mo

Limited time offer pricing, join now to lock in your promo price.

[Try it FREE for 30 days](https://orbisx.com/free-trial)

New features and updates will be automatically available within your account as they become available for use. Pricing in USD. Applicable taxes extra and pay-per-use features available with credits or 3rd party apps like Dialpad and Twilio for SMS messaging from your number.

*   Free trial account
*   No contracts or commitments
*   Simple, monthly pricing
*   FB group with 3000+ members

*   No limits to your growth, all features available with no tiers
*   Free updates & new features all the time
*   iOS & Android apps included

*   Top-notch support around the clock
*   Automations and artificial intelligence
*   No hidden fees or surprises

OrbisX integrates with everything you need to take streamline your shop, grow your business and save time.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: OrbisX offers a single pricing plan with all features included, no tiers, and unlimited usage.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Includes all features with no limits.

promotional_offers.offer_description: Join now to lock in your promo price.

additional_fees.fee_description: Taxes are extra and calculated based on location.

Simple & Transparent Pricing

![Image 14](https://orbisx.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/orbisx-preview-laptop.jpg)

At OrbisX we believe in simplicity. When we started our auto shop we were forced to use multiple tools apps, tools and softwares that were overpriced and lacking necessary features for our industry. Each of these apps had their own fees and headaches while only getting the job half done. We built OrbisX to run our shop from one central app to remove the disconnects, reduce operating costs and add in the missing pieces to create the perfect software for automotive professionals. Once we decided to make it available to automotive pros around the globe we wanted to keep it simple for our members with one pricing plan that includes everything you need.

**OrbisX has all the bells and whistles that your company needs to truly succeed.** We have invested and continue to invest thousands of hours of development and artificial intelligence to help your business grow.

This is not just another glorified Excel sheet and customer management system. OrbisX is a business growth and customer experience system with all the tools you need like CARFAX, Reserve With Google, SiriusXM, QuickBooks, Stripe, Square, Clover, Dialpad, Twilio integrations (+ 5000 other apps) and everything from invoicing, payments, expenses, deposits, estimates, reports and financials to automation like our AI that books appointments for you!

![Image 15](https://orbisx.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/shutterstock_2479720287.jpg)

![Image 16](https://orbisx.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/phone2.png)

Streamline Everything for Your Business
---------------------------------------

OrbisX offers a comprehensive solution to manage, automate, and grow your business with marketing tools and artificial intelligence under the hood. Our platform enables you to schedule jobs more efficiently, send professional quotes and invoices, accept online payments, and generate detailed reports. With features like automated Google reviews and appointment reminders, inventory management, staff time tracking, and on-the-spot payments with hardware terminals, OrbisX streamlines your operations seamlessly. Plus, our intuitive mobile app, video training resources, and easy setup ensure that you’ll be running a more efficient business in no time. Join OrbisX today and experience unparalleled convenience and growth.

Simple Pricing. No contracts. Unlimited potential, automation and growth.

#### $100/mo

Limited time offer pricing, join now to lock in your promo price.

[Try it FREE for 30 days](https://orbisx.com/free-trial)

New features and updates will be automatically available within your account as they become available for use. Pricing in USD. Applicable taxes extra and pay-per-use features available with credits or 3rd party apps like Dialpad and Twilio for SMS messaging from your number.

*   Free trial account
*   No contracts or commitments
*   Simple, monthly pricing
*   FB group with 3000+ members

*   No limits to your growth, all features available with no tiers
*   Free updates & new features all the time
*   iOS & Android apps included

*   Top-notch support around the clock
*   Automations and artificial intelligence
*   No hidden fees or surprises

OrbisX integrates with everything you need to take streamline your shop, grow your business and save time.
